Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: An affected girl who presented at 9 months of age and her similarly affected younger brother and father were all found to have a novel missense mutation ( G1758 - - > T ) encoding the amino acid substitution Gly23 - - > Val within NPII .

Let's think step by step.

| --- |
| NPII |

The paragraph mentions the following diseases:

1. NPII (N-myc downstream-regulated gene 1)

Note: NPII is a gene, not a disease. However, it is mentioned in the context of a novel missense mutation that affects the function of the NPII protein, which may cause a disease or disorder.
